meanings.definition: Brought in from another country for sale or use.
meanings.sent1: The store sells imported chocolates from France.
meanings.sent2: She bought an imported dress from Italy.
meanings.sent3: The imported tea made her feel like she was in a different place.
meanings.sent4: The imported spices added an exotic touch to the dish.
meanings.sent5: The imported silk fabric was smooth and luxurious.

meanings.definition: To bring in goods or services from another country for sale or use.
meanings.sent1: They imported the latest technology from Japan.
meanings.sent2: He imported rare wines for his restaurant.
meanings.sent3: She joked that she would import sunshine if she could.
meanings.sent4: Bringing in new ideas can be like importing fresh air into a stuffy room.
meanings.sent5: The company imported high-quality materials for their products.
